Gogte  Institute of Technology was founded in 1979 to create Engineers who can define, design and deliver technology to improve peoples lives. In all our pursuits we lay profound emphasis on values to fulfill the universal goal of creating a happy and peaceful society.
 Today, GIT lies in the league of premier institutes of Karnataka and has a tryst with global standards in its commitment to bring up ‘Engineers of Tomorrow’.
Engineering is a hands-on experience and our students are trained towards providing solutions to real problems. Hence, while we provide engineering education that is high-tech and research-driven, it is nonetheless environment-friendly and human. for more details visit http://www.git.edu.in/
Gogte  Institute of Technology was established in the year 1979.
GIT is Accregated and Recognised by AICTE,VTU,ICI,IEEE,MSME,NPTEL,KSCST etc

GIT provides college Buses, it has toatl 8 Buses 
 Seating capacity 24 for one bus and 
 42 for remaining buses. More than 800+ students are using college bus facility
